name: Zenon Gorski
story: Zenon Gorski served in the Polish Army for over 20 years before retiring and joining the Independent forces in the ongoing civil conflict. He is known for his rough personality and his aggressive behavior in combat. Despite his short temper, fellow soldiers respect his combat skills and his ability to get the job done. Zenon is married and has two children- a daughter who is studying law at university and a son who recently enlisted in the military.
